name: Brain Strain
overview: This is a game for one or two player, sort of based on Coined by Slash Design, but instead of taking away coins, you take away numbers. The game starts where you have a pot with the total number of credits. Either yourself, your opponent or a computer will take it in turns to take a chosen number of credits away. If you are left with 4 credits, and can take them all away, you will win. However if you are left with LESS than 4 credits left in the pot, then you will forefit the round. The winner is the first player to score 3 points.
